title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results are not being selected in an external jar in Build 200201151. When performing a search for references to this field, the first match is not selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not automatically selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be automatically selected.
SR:
1. Open the application with Build 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to a specific field.
3. Double-click on the first search result.
4. Observe that the first match is not automatically selected.
